title: Custom Font?
content:
Any help ID'ing the handwritten font on this cover would be AWESOME! Thanks a mil.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2013-05-08 at 12.31.32 PM.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016071458/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-05-08%20at%2012.31.32%20PM.pdf) | 807.04 KB |
author: luccio

comments.content: Also, anything in the same vein as this would be wonderful too :)

Choc or Mistral would do the job.

[http://www.linotype.com/165892/ChocStdRegular-ot-cff-std-font.html?showV...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016071458/http:/www.linotype.com/165892/ChocStdRegular-ot-cff-std-font.html?showVariation=165893 "http://www.linotype.com/165892/ChocStdRegular-ot-cff-std-font.html?showVariation=165893")

[http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/font.aspx?FMID=1007](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016071458/http:/www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/font.aspx?FMID=1007 "http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/font.aspx?FMID=1007")
thanks man! i think croc is close, but there's a slight difference in the lowercase "a".
